pr_title: Sanitise the user.name property prior to use

timeline.message:
:art: Sanitise the user.name property prior to use
* Perform basic sanitisation of system properites
* Added `StringUtilities.removeSpecialCharacters`
* Fix the location of the `StringUtilities` unit test

timeline.bodyText: You could use [^\\w] here instead; that would additionally allow underscores , but that seems reasonable to me.
timeline.author: cygnus-x-1

replies.bodyText: @cygnus-x-1 yeah but an _ is a special character right? I'd prefer to leave this as is if that's ok?

replies.bodyText: @cygnus-x-1 (re-sending in case you missed it) did you prefer this still be changed or happy as is?
